# SpeexAEC - Python Bindings for SpeexDSP

[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-BSD--3--Clause-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.9%2B-blue.svg)](https://python.org)
[![CI/CD](https://github.com/leitat-raise/package-speexaec/actions/workflows/publish.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/leitat-raise/package-speexaec/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml)

High-performance Python bindings for the [SpeexDSP](https://gitlab.xiph.org/xiph/speexdsp) audio processing library. Designed for real-time audio applications including VoIP, video conferencing, and embedded audio processing.

## Features

- **ğŸ”Š Echo Cancellation**: Advanced acoustic echo cancellation using adaptive filters
- **ğŸ”‡ Noise Suppression**: Real-time spectral noise reduction
- **ğŸ™ï¸ Voice Activity Detection**: Automatic speech vs silence detection  
- **ğŸ“Š Automatic Gain Control**: Dynamic volume adjustment
- **ğŸ”„ Audio Resampling**: High-quality sample rate conversion
- **ğŸš€ Real-time Performance**: Optimized for low-latency applications
- **ğŸ”— NumPy Integration**: Seamless numpy array processing
